Text:
Thank you everyone for your patience.  At the last moment, the original seed location couldn't connect to any trackers.  It's been a slow, agonizing weekend for me so I can only imagine how you feel trying to complete the download.

The problen as been rectified, but the data no longer exists in that location, so I've peered it so it can provide whatever data it receives at higher speeds.

The next series in the boxset is coming and will be provided at "proper" speeds.
